data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 3, Torino's Sasa Lukic has run offside.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Genoa.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Torino needs to be cautious. Genoa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 8, Amer Gojak of Torino is pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
In the minute 10, Torino take a 0-1 lead thanks to Sasa Lukic.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Genoa.
Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
In the minute 15, Genoa's Marko Pjaca attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Torino have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Torino.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Torino.
Paolo Valeri signals a Genoa throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 22, Paolo Valeri awards Torino a goal kick.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Amer Gojak (Torino) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 24, Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Genoa, close to Torino's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Torino to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 26, Luca Pellegrini has the misfortune to make it 0-2 through an own goal.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Milan Badelj (Genoa) has received a yellow card from Paolo Valeri.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Genoa drive upfield and Nicolo Rovella gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Torino defender.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 34, Paolo Valeri signals a Genoa throw-in in Torino's half.
Genoa are pushing forward but Paolo Ghiglione's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 35, Andrea Belotti is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 37, Andrea Belotti for Torino is back on the field again.
Torino's Wilfried Stephane Singo is back in action after a slight knock.
Wilfried Stephane Singo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Gianluca Scamacca (Genoa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Torino.
Torino to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Free kick Genoa.
The first-half has ended.
Tomas Rincon for Torino has been booked by Paolo Valeri and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Genoa in Genoa.
The home team replace Edoardo Goldaniga with Goran Pandev.
Rolando Maran is making the team's second substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Mattia Bani replacing Miha Zajc.
Important block from the Torino defence as Marko Pjaca fires in a strike for Genoa.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Genoa push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Paolo Ghiglione gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
Torino’s Wilfried Stephane Singo is on his feet again at Luigi Ferraris.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
In the minute 50, Genoa's Luca Pellegrini breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 50, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Wilfried Stephane Singo.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino just outside Genoa's area.
In the minute 51, Nicolo Rovella (Genoa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 53, Sasa Lukic for Torino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Torino make their first substitution with Soualiho Meite replacing Amer Gojak.
In the minute 54, Marco Giampaolo (Torino) is making a second substitution, with Federico Bonazzoli replacing Simone Verdi.
Ricardo Rodriguez is on a sub for Nicola Murru for Torino.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 55, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Genoa.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 58, Torino's Soualiho Meite gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Paolo Valeri awards Genoa a goal kick.
Goal kick for Torino at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 62, In Genoa Torino attack through Andrea Belotti. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Genoa.
Attention is being given to Genoa’s Luca Pellegrini and play has been suspended briefly.
Luca Pellegrini has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
In the minute 66, In Genoa, Gianluca Scamacca of Genoa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Lukas Lerager (Genoa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 67, Luca Pellegrini (Genoa) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Domenico Criscito.
Vittorio Parigini is replacing Marko Pjaca for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 68, At Luigi Ferraris, Wilfried Stephane Singo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
Paolo Valeri awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Andrea Belotti of Torino gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick Genoa.
Torino's Federico Bonazzoli gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Genoa have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Wilfried Stephane Singo with Mergim Vojvoda. This is the fourth substitution made today by Marco Giampaolo.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Torino.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 76, Mattia Bani's header is off-target for Genoa.
Paolo Valeri awards Torino a goal kick.
The match at Luigi Ferraris has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mattia Bani, who is down injured.
In the minute 77, Mattia Bani returns to the field for Genoa after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Torino at Luigi Ferraris.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
In the minute 80, Genoa drives forward and Vittorio Parigini gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 83, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Torino.
Karol Linetty (Torino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 86, Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Genoa, close to Torino's area.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Torino.
In the minute 88, Cristian Ansaldi is replacing Karol Linetty for the away team.
Genoa make their fifth substitution with Mattia Destro replacing Nicolo Rovella.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 89, Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Free kick Genoa.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Genoa.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Torino.
Genoa attack but Gianluca Scamacca's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Torino at Luigi Ferraris.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Sasa Lukic (Torino) has received a first yellow card.
Gianluca Scamacca keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
Goran Pandev instrumental with a fine assist.
